name: gbeeven

stmt.origin: simplbi(wcel(c0, cgbe), wcel(c0, ceven), wrex(hs0, cprime, wrex(hs1, cprime, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), codd), wcel(cv(hs1), codd), wceq(c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)))))))
